summary: Build a website for the user's taekwondo academy.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Taekwondo academy logo mark with a bold, modern martial-arts aesthetic (tkd-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner image showing a dynamic taekwondo training scene in a clean illustrated style (tkd-hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
- Subtle repeating background pattern inspired by martial-arts motifs (tkd-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public marketing website for a Taekwondo academy with a responsive layout and clear navigation, including pages/sections for: Home (hero + highlights), About the Academy, Programs/Classes, Schedule, Instructors, Pricing/Memberships, FAQ, and Contact.
Implement a Contact form that allows visitors to submit inquiries (name, email, phone optional, message) and store submissions in the backend canister so they persist across reloads.
Add a simple admin-only view protected by Internet Identity login that lists submitted contact inquiries (most recent first) for academy staff.
Establish a coherent, distinct visual theme for a martial-arts academy brand (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across the site (do not use a blue/purple theme).
Add the required generated static images to the project and use them in the UI (hero and branding areas) from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for the taekwondo academy
